item.title: English Kids Song - Beebusters
item.description:
No bee shall be free
beebusters
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
If there’s a buzz
don’t make a fuss
Just call us
beebusters
We’re not afraid
of the sound they make
Give us a buzz
beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
In the cup
on my nose
Under the bench
beebusters
In front of
the house
Behind the tree
beside me beebusters
Between you
and your friend
Don’t bee
afraid
Wherever there’s a bee
beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
We’ll catch that buzz
we’ll catch that buzz
We’ll catch it
beebusters beebusters
Come on
wherever there’s a bee
We’ll catch it
beebusters
